title: Sky is the Massively Successful Follow-up to Journey No One Is Talking About
description:
Sky: Children of the Light is an excellent and successful game from developer thatgamecompany, the creator of Journey, yet it so rarely gets the sort of media attention that Journey received. Let’s fix that.

title: What's Old Is New Again | Breakout
description:
This week on Breakout, we discuss franchises (or series) we'd like to see make a return, the use of deepfakes in media and reminisce a little bit about The Escapist as the site enters its third year of its revival effort on Thursday.
